name: Brand of Hobbling
text: This spell etches a symbol of chains, a particular prison, or a lawful institution on the target, dealing 1d6 points of damage. The mark can be placed on any exposed portion of the creature, typically on the head or forearm. While the recipient is branded in this way, all of its movement speeds are reduced by half (rounded down to the next 5-foot increment). A brand of hobbling can be hidden by clothing or removed by scraping the brand away (the latter deals 1d6 points of damage, though the brand returns if that damage is healed), but in either case the effects of a brand of hobbling continue to function.
text_zh: 这个法术会在目标身上铭刻下锁链，某特殊监狱或是某执法机构的徽记并造成1d6点伤害。这个印记可以刻在目标生物任何裸露的位置，比如头部或是手臂。被铭下标记的受术者移动速度会减半（四舍五入到5尺增量）。蹒跚烙印可以被遮盖或是被削除（造成1d6伤害并且会在被治疗后回归），但烙印效果会持续。
